headline: Diamondback Energy, Inc. Schedules Fourth Quarter 2025 Conference Call for February 24, 2026
summary: MIDLAND, Texas, Jan. 07, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ: FANG) (“Diamondback”), today announced that it plans to release fourth quarter 2025 financial results on February 23, 2026 after the market closes. In connection with the earnings release, Diamondback will host a conference call and webcast for investors and analysts to discuss its results for the fourth quarter of 2025 on Tuesday, February 24, 2026 at 8:00 a.m. CT.
